meanings.definition: A garden feature consisting of rocks arranged in a decorative manner.
meanings.sent1: The backyard had beautiful rockeries that added charm to the garden.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy creating rockeries in their yards to enhance the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the rockeries as a hiding spot for its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of thoughts, with rockeries of memories scattered throughout.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the rockeries, turning them into shimmering jewels.
